original_title: Bernie Sanders Meets Frankie Boyle | It's OK to Be Angry About Capitalism
overview: Filmed February 24th 2023 at Brighton Dome. The longest-serving independent in Congress, the leader of democratic socialism in America, and a hero to progressives across the globe, Bernie Sanders joined the comedian Frankie Boyle to take on the 1%.  Senator Sanders has a vision of what would be possible if the political revolution took place. If we would finally recognize that economic rights are human rights, and work to create a society that provides them. This isnâ€™t some utopian fantasy; this is democracy as we should know it. Is it really too much to ask?
title: Bernie Sanders Meets Frankie Boyle | It's OK to Be Angry About Capitalism
